18:14 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
18:42 <jvelo> has joined #xwiki  
18:50 <vmassol> jvelo: so you did it! cool, I'm eager to see what it does (the doc doesn't tell much ATM) :)  
18:50 <jvelo> Well it doesn't do much anyway ;)  
18:50 <vmassol> hehe  
18:50 <jvelo> but I will be adding some screenshots  
18:50 <vmassol> great  
18:50 <jvelo> I've published because I want to test the install via EM  
18:50 <vmassol> ok  
18:51 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
18:51 <jvelo> I've imported the extension via the Import UI, not sure if I should have done that or not  
18:51 <vmassol> it's ok  
18:51 <vmassol> It was a bit strange for me when it happened  
18:51 <vmassol> because usually we see projects in contrib  
18:52 <vmassol> so it was a bit lile magic  
18:52 <vmassol> s/lile/like/  
18:52 <+sburjan> quake style :D I already like it  
18:53 <vmassol> having quake as an xwiki easter-egg would be fun  
18:53 <vmassol> so that you can plan with other people working on the same page/space as you ;)  
18:54 <jvelo> mmh I have couple of things to fix before it's usable. But I should meet the hackathon deadline  
18:54 <jvelo> provided it's midnight :)  
18:56 <vmassol> you still have one full day  
18:56 <vmassol> :)  
18:57 <vmassol> here in romania we're going to work on the hackathon the whole day tomorrow  
18:57 <+sburjan> don't think so vmassol  
18:57 <+sburjan> we already have to present tomorrow  
18:57 <vmassol> tomorrow morning is hackathon and afternoon is hackathon presentation  
18:59 <vmassol> has quit  
19:02 <jvelo> OK good news then  
19:04 <jvelo> Wow the extension manager has become the awesomest stuff ever!  
19:05 <jvelo> hadn't tested a recent version for a long time
